data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Gadag, Karnataka, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gadag, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Gadag.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Gadag who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, guide the church in Gadag, Karnataka, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Harkantra people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Harkantra people know you.
Father, let those from the 11,711 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,039,972, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.section_summary:
the county of Gadag, Karnataka, India has a population of 1,064,600.

We estimate Gadag has 11,711 people who might know Jesus, 12,917 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,039,972 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Gadag, Karnataka, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
